author: @zazoomblog
title: Usa Democratici e Deep State | una Maidan contro Trump
text:
Usa Democratici e Deep State | una Maidan contro Trump
Il panorama politico statunitense si infiamma: i Democratici e il cosiddetto Ã¢â‚¬Å“deep stateÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ hanno orchestrato una vera e propria maidan contro Trump, simbolo di una presunta deriva autoritaria. Per sabato 14 giugno, giorno della grande parata per i 250 anni dellÃ¢â‚¬â„¢esercito USA, le manifestazioni Ã¢â‚¬Å“No KingsÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ si moltiplicano, con oltre 13.000 adesioni e 320 eventi in tutto il paese. Una prova di forza per difendere la democrazia o un tentativo di destabilizzare?
Per sabato 14 giugno, giorno in cui ÃƒÂ¨ prevista unÃ¢â‚¬â„¢imponente parata per i 250 anni di fondazione dellÃ¢â‚¬â„¢esercito Usa, i democratici hanno indetto manifestazioni in tutto il Paese contro Trump, il Ã¢â‚¬Å“dittatoreÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½. AllÃ¢â‚¬â„¢iniziativa, denominata Ã¢â‚¬Å“No KingsÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½, avevano aderito, al 10 giugno, oltre 13.000 persone, le quali hanno confermato la loro partecipazione a 320 eventi che avranno luogo in tutto il Paese. Una prova di forza per dire no Ã¢â‚¬Å“allÃ¢â‚¬â„¢autoritarismoÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ manifestato con la stretta sugli immigrati clandestini. Previste, secondo Axios, 1.800 manifestazioni in tutti i 50 Stati Usa e nel Commonwealth, compreso Porto Rico.
[ðŸ”— Leggi su It.insideover.com]
In questa notizia si parla di: democratici - trump - deep - state
La famiglia reale del Qatar vuole regalare a Trump un nuovo Air Force One: lui ÃƒÂ¨ dÃ¢â‚¬â„¢accordo, i Democratici no - Un presente di lusso, come un Boeing 747-8, potrebbe sembrare un dono inaspettato e straordinario per Donald Trump.
L'alter ego e avversario del presidente degli Stati Uniti. Si presenta cosÃƒÂ¬, Gavin Newsom, nei giorni in cui la Casa Bianca militarizza la risposta alle proteste scoppiate a Los Angeles. Donald Trump? "Un dittatore". Il profilo su #SkyInsider[Vai su Facebook]
CosÃƒÂ¬ la lotta di Trump al Deep State minaccia la sicurezza Usa; Manipoli e deep state Il partito-Stato di Trump potrebbe non avere il successo di quello fascista; Stato dellÃ¢â‚¬â„¢Unione: Trump avanti tutta, contro macchina globalista e burocrazie non elette.
Tutte le teorie del complotto sull'attentato a Trump: messinscena, Deep State, colpo di mano del movimento Antifa Scrive corriere.it: 1, seguito da oltre un milione di persone, va oltre: Â«Siccome i casi giudiziari di Trump non stavano andando tanto bene, hanno deciso (i democratici ...

author: Redazione Meteo MeteoWeb
title: Previsioni Meteo Alcamo: il bollettino per domani lunedÃ¬ 14 ottobre
text:
Le previsioni meteo per LunedÃ¬ 14 Ottobre a Alcamo indicano una giornata caratterizzata da condizioni prevalentemente serene, con un aumento della copertura nuvolosa nel pomeriggio. Le temperature si manterranno su valori gradevoli, oscillando tra i 18,3Â°C e i 24,2Â°C , mentre i venti saranno leggeri e prevalentemente da nord. Lâ€™umiditÃ  si attesterÃ  attorno al 60% , garantendo un clima piuttosto confortevole.
Nella notte , le condizioni saranno di cielo sereno con temperature che si aggireranno intorno ai 18,3Â°C . La temperatura percepita sarÃ  leggermente inferiore, attorno ai 17,8Â°C , con venti leggeri provenienti da sud. Lâ€™umiditÃ  si manterrÃ  attorno al 62% , mentre la pressione atmosferica sarÃ  di 1020 hPa .
Durante la mattina , il meteo continuerÃ  a rimanere sereno, con un incremento graduale delle temperature che raggiungeranno i 22,9Â°C entro le 09:00 . La copertura nuvolosa rimarrÃ  bassa, attorno al 7% , e i venti si faranno piÃ¹ sostenuti, con velocitÃ  che toccheranno i 7 km/h . Lâ€™umiditÃ  scenderÃ  fino al 42% , rendendo lâ€™aria piÃ¹ secca e piacevole.
Nel pomeriggio , si prevede un aumento della copertura nuvolosa, con nubi sparse che raggiungeranno il 74% di copertura alle 13:00 . Le temperature si stabilizzeranno attorno ai 24Â°C , con una leggera diminuzione nel corso delle ore. I venti continueranno a soffiare da nord-nord ovest, mantenendo una velocitÃ  di circa 11 km/h . Lâ€™umiditÃ  aumenterÃ  leggermente, arrivando fino al 62% .
La sera porterÃ  un ritorno a condizioni piÃ¹ serene, con temperature che scenderanno a 19,9Â°C alle 21:00 . La copertura nuvolosa si ridurrÃ  nuovamente, mantenendosi attorno allâ€™ 8% . I venti saranno leggeri, con velocitÃ  che si attesteranno intorno ai 2,4 km/h . Lâ€™umiditÃ  si stabilizzerÃ  attorno al 61% , mentre la pressione atmosferica rimarrÃ  costante.
In conclusione, le previsioni del tempo per i prossimi giorni a Alcamo indicano un miglioramento delle condizioni meteo, con temperature gradevoli e cieli sereni. MartedÃ¬ e mercoledÃ¬ si prevede un ulteriore aumento delle temperature, con possibilitÃ  di qualche nube in piÃ¹, ma senza precipitazioni significative. Gli amanti del bel tempo potranno godere di giornate soleggiate e piacevoli, ideali per attivitÃ  allâ€™aperto.

author: La Palma Ahora
title: CaixaBank renueva su patrocinio para potenciar la cantera del Club Baloncesto Gran Canaria
text: CaixaBank y el Club Baloncesto Gran Canaria han suscrito un nuevo acuerdo de colaboraciÃ³n, por el que la entidad financiera continuarÃ¡ respaldando a las categorÃ­as inferiores del club claretiano y apostando por el desarrollo de programas educativos para la formaciÃ³n en valores y el fomento del baloncesto entre los mÃ¡s de mil jÃ³venes deportistas que integran la cantera del club. El acuerdo ha sido presentado en la oficina â€˜all in oneâ€™ Gran Canaria de CaixaBank por el director territorial de CaixaBank en Canarias, Manuel Afonso, y por el presidente del Club Baloncesto Gran Canaria, Sitapha SavanÃ©, consolidando una relaciÃ³n de mÃ¡s de 13 aÃ±os de apoyo al club amarillo por parte de la entidad financiera. El director territorial de CaixaBank en Canarias ha puesto de manifiesto â€œla histÃ³rica vinculaciÃ³n con el club y los valores que ambos compartimos, como son el esfuerzo, la superaciÃ³n y el trabajo en equipo, que cobran una enorme importancia en el desarrollo de este gran proyecto deportivo que apuesta firmemente por la canteraâ€. Asimismo, Afonso ha destacado la relevancia de este patrocinio â€œque nos posiciona como entidad referente en la promociÃ³n del deporte y que reafirma nuestro compromiso con el progreso social, cultural y econÃ³mico de las Islasâ€. Por su parte, el presidente del Club Baloncesto Gran Canaria ha seÃ±alado que â€œpara el club, CaixaBank es un partner estratÃ©gico por todas las cosas que hacemos juntos, y por tener una marca de su nivel a nuestro lado, lo que dice muchÃ­simo de nuestra organizaciÃ³n Su apoyo a todas las actividades de la cantera es muy importante, y es el mayor impacto social que tenemosâ€, explicÃ³ SavanÃ©. La entidad financiera continuarÃ¡ respaldando el â€˜Triple Solidarioâ€™, una iniciativa mediante la que CaixaBank dona 50 euros por cada triple que el primer equipo anote durante los partidos y competiciones de Liga. Todo el importe recaudado se destina, al tÃ©rmino de cada temporada, a proyectos formativos de la cantera. Gracias a este acuerdo, las categorÃ­as inferiores del Club Baloncesto Gran Canaria tambiÃ©n se beneficiarÃ¡n del â€˜Campus de Verano CaixaBankâ€™. El compromiso entre la entidad financiera y el club contempla a su vez la participaciÃ³n de jugadores, cuerpo tÃ©cnico y personal del Granca en proyectos de carÃ¡cter social que el banco impulsa en Canarias como â€˜El Ãrbol de los SueÃ±osâ€™, por el que mÃ¡s de 2.000 niÃ±os y niÃ±as de las Islas pueden tener su regalo cada Navidad. CaixaBank, patrocinador de referencia del baloncesto espaÃ±ol CaixaBank es socio patrocinador de la FederaciÃ³n EspaÃ±ola de Baloncesto (FEB) y patrocinador oficial de la selecciÃ³n espaÃ±ola, tanto femenina como masculina, en todas sus categorÃ­as, que van desde la absoluta hasta la sub-16, y patrocinador principal de la FederaciÃ³n EspaÃ±ola de Deportes de Personas con Discapacidad FÃ­sica, con el objetivo de impulsar el baloncesto en silla de ruedas. La entidad financiera se ha involucrado con el baloncesto nacional desde el aÃ±o 2013 y su implicaciÃ³n y activaciÃ³n de mÃºltiples iniciativas en torno a este deporte han ayudado a visibilizar y ampliar la repercusiÃ³n de los mayores Ã©xitos cosechados internacionalmente. En su implementaciÃ³n de la estrategia de patrocinio local, CaixaBank ha colaborado con los principales eventos baloncestÃ­sticos que se han celebrado en la Ãºltima dÃ©cada en EspaÃ±a, tanto profesionales como amateurs, trasladando los valores del deporte a todos los rincones del paÃ­s. Prueba de ello es la apuesta como patrocinador oficial de la Copa del Mundo de 2014 celebrada en EspaÃ±a, la colaboraciÃ³n con la Copa del Mundo de Baloncesto Femenino celebrada en Tenerife el aÃ±o 2018, el Eurobasket femenino que se disputÃ³ en Valencia en 2021 o el histÃ³rico compromiso con el circuito Plaza 3x3 CaixaBank. Con motivo de la Copa del Mundo Masculina celebrada en EspaÃ±a 2014, la FEB y CaixaBank unieron esfuerzos con el fin de fomentar un programa de voluntariado deportivo que trascendiera la propia competiciÃ³n: el programa voluntarios FEB CaixaBank. Siete aÃ±os despuÃ©s, el programa ha conseguido tejer una sÃ³lida comunidad de cerca de 23.000 voluntarios, que dan apoyo a todos los eventos oficiales de baloncesto organizados por la FEB.

author: rafagonzalezd
title: Cae una banda que secuestrÃ³ a un empresario portuguÃ©s
text:
Barcelona (EFE).- Los Mossos dâ€™Esquadra junto con la PolicÃ­a Nacional y la PolicÃ­a Judicial Portuguesa, coordinados por la Europol, han detenido a nueve personas acusadas de secuestrar a un empresario de 82 aÃ±os en Portugal, que fue liberado atado a un Ã¡rbol en CollbatÃ³ (Barcelona), y de otro intento de secuestro frustrado.
De los nueve detenidos, cinco han sido arrestados en Torremolinos (MÃ¡laga) y los otros cuatro en Alicante, Sucina (Murcia) y MÃ¡laga, y se les atribuyen los delitos de secuestro, robo con violencia y pertenencia a un grupo criminal.
La investigaciÃ³n de la llamada â€˜OperaciÃ³n Lusoâ€™ se iniciÃ³ el pasado 25 de agosto de la mano de la Europol a partir de un primer secuestro de un empresario de 82 aÃ±os en Almacil (Portugal), al que lograron sustraer unos 100.000 euros.
SegÃºn ha informado este jueves en rueda de prensa el inspector de los Mossos dâ€™Esquadra Rafael Montes, la vÃ­ctima explicÃ³ que le habÃ­an asaltado y obligado a pasar a la parte trasera de su coche, para que los atacantes pudiesen conducir el vehÃ­culo.
Durante las aproximadamente 20 horas que tardaron en cubrir los 1.200 kilÃ³metros que separan Almancil de la localidad barcelonesa de CollbatÃ³ los secuestradores golpearon y amenazaron al hombre para conseguir sus claves bancarias e iniciar grandes movimientos de dinero.
La vÃ­ctima fue encontrada en una carretera secundaria La vÃ­ctima, que fue encontrada desorientada por un vecino de CollbatÃ³ en una carretera secundaria, presentaba contusiones, lesiones superficiales y hematomas, cosa que alertÃ³ de inmediato a las autoridades locales.
La vÃ­ctima, una vez superada la barrera del idioma, explicÃ³ que los secuestradores le habÃ­an dejado atado a un Ã¡rbol despuÃ©s de trasladarle desde Portugal.
El vehÃ­culo fue encontrado dÃ­as despuÃ©s correctamente aparcado en un aparcamiento del Aeropuerto de Barcelona, lo que permitiÃ³ obtener imÃ¡genes de los autores y acceder al vehÃ­culo para que la policÃ­a cientÃ­fica pudiese analizarlo en busca de huellas.
El inspector Rafael Montes ha hecho hincapiÃ© en la importancia del estudio de transferencias continuadas de dinero a diferentes cuentas, porque los delincuentes operaban con entidades bancarias, todas a travÃ©s de internet, abiertas con documentos falsos, para intentar dificultar el rastreo del dinero.
AdemÃ¡s, los detenidos, de nacionalidad brasileÃ±a y de entre 24 y 25 aÃ±os, utilizaron las tarjetas de crÃ©dito de la vÃ­ctima para hacer compras en locales de restauraciÃ³n y tiendas de electrÃ³nica.
Cae en Muros de NalÃ³n una banda dedicada al trafico de armas de fuego, municiÃ³n y drogas Alrededor de 100.000 euros sustraÃ­dos Los cuerpos de seguridad cifran en alrededor de 100.000 euros el dinero sustraÃ­do a la vÃ­ctima, y estÃ¡n en trÃ¡mites judiciales para recuperar parte del capital, que se transfiriÃ³ a entidades ubicadas en Francia y Lituania.
A lo largo del secuestro, los autores realizaron hasta 52 transferencias bancarias, ademÃ¡s de diferentes paradas en cajeros automÃ¡ticos y tiendas en las que usaron las tarjetas de crÃ©dito de la vÃ­ctima.
El inspector de la PolicÃ­a Judicial Portuguesa Batista Correira ha explicado que la banda seleccionaba vÃ­ctimas con un patrimonio muy elevado y con dinero en la cuenta corriente y seguÃ­a sus pasos durante un periodo de tiempo, ademÃ¡s de buscar informaciÃ³n exhaustiva.
Las detenciones se desataron con un intento de secuestro frustrado el 11 de diciembre a una mujer cuando antes de llegar a su domicilio en SetÃºbal (Portugal), apareciÃ³ un vehÃ­culo, del que bajaron dos personas, y la amenazaron con un arma de fuego para intentar introducirla en la parte posterior del coche de ella.
Alertada por los gritos de la mujer, su pareja saliÃ³ y forcejeÃ³ con los secuestradores, que acabaron renunciando al secuestro, pero que huyeron con el vehÃ­culo de la vÃ­ctima.
La mujer denunciÃ³ el robo de su vehÃ­culo y, gracias al GPS del mismo, el coche se pudo localizar en Torremolinos (MÃ¡laga), junto con los cinco autores de la tentativa de secuestro.
Siete registros de domicilios Tras este suceso, los cuerpos de seguridad llevaron a cabo siete registros de domicilios en los que encontraron una arma de fuego, dos armas de fuego simuladas, telÃ©fonos, documentaciÃ³n falsificada, bridas, ropa del dÃ­a del secuestro y una impresora especializada en la impresiÃ³n de documentaciÃ³n.
El inspector de la PolicÃ­a Nacional de la UDYCO de Alicante Juan Castillo ha explicado las dificultades que encontraron para hacer los registros y las detenciones, puesto que los criminales â€œnunca estaban en su domicilio ni juntos, iban a Francia, a Portugalâ€.
Entre los nueve detenidos se encuentran dos de los tres autores materiales del primer secuestro, que han ingresado en una cÃ¡rcel de Alicante, mientras que el tercero ya estaba en prisiÃ³n por un intento de robo con violencia en un prostÃ­bulo de Alicante.
Los otros integrantes de la banda, considerados como grupo de apoyo y encargados de los movimientos bancarios fraudulentos, han sido puestos en libertad con cargos.

author: Reuters
title: Vietnam 2023 economic growth slows to 5.05%, missing government target
text: By Khanh Vu HANOI (Reuters) -Vietnamâ€™s economic growth slowed to 5.05% this year from an expansion of 8.02% last year, official data showed on Friday, weighed by weak global demand while public investment stalled amid an intensified anti-graft crackdown. This yearâ€™s gross domestic product (GDP) growth was below a government target of 6.5% and lower than average growth of 5.87% during the previous decade, according to the data released by the governmentâ€™s General Statistics Office (GSO). Vietnam is a regional manufacturing hub, which relies heavily on trade, but exports in 2023 fell 4.4% from last year to $355.5 billion, with shipments of smartphones, its largest foreign currency earner, dropping 8.3%, the GSO said in its report. Industrial production index in 2023 rose 1.5% from last year, while average consumer prices in the year rose 3.25%, according to the GSO. Retail sales were up 9.6%. â€œThough this yearâ€™s growth is below a government target of 6.5%, it is still a positive result, putting Vietnam in the group of the fastest growing economies in the region and in the world,â€ the GSO said. Imports in 2023 fell 8.9% to $327.5 billion, resulting in a trade surplus of $28 billion for the year, according to the report. A large trade surplus is supportive for the dong currency, but a sharp fall in imports could indicate a slowdown in manufacturing activities in the months ahead. The countryâ€™s central bank, in an effort to boost economic growth, has this year cut its policy rates four times, reducing its refinance rate and discount rate by an accumulated 150 basis points each, but credit growth remains much weaker than its target of 14%. Overall credit growth in the economy as of end-November was 8.2%, according to data from the State Bank of Vietnam, the countryâ€™s central bank, which said the â€œthe economy was still facing difficulties with a slow economic recovery and therefore the demand for loans was weak.â€ To compensate for the fall in exports, Vietnam has decided to extend a value-added tax cut to boost domestic consumption, while authorities have been seeking to speed up public investment, mostly on infrastructure. But public investment has stalled this year amid an intensification of the countryâ€™s â€œblazing furnaceâ€ anti-corruption campaign, which has often paralysed activities. Disbursement of public funds in the year to the end of November was estimated at 461 trillion dong ($18.98 billion), meeting only 65% of the target set for the year, according to the Ministry of Planning and Investment. For the fourth quarter of this year, GDP grew 6.72% from a year earlier, faster than an expansion of 5.47% in the third quarter and a growth of 5.92% in the same period last year, according to the GSO. Third quarter GDP growth was revised up from 5.33% Vietnamâ€™s legislature in November approved government targets for next year of GDP growth of 6.0% to 6.5% and inflation in a range of 4.0% to 4.5% (Reporting by Khanh Vu and Phuong Nguyen; Editing by Francesco Guarascio, Stephen Coates and Jamie Freed)

author: Josh Wallace
title: Chance to spot northern lights underway in Oklahoma
text:
Chance to spot northern lights underway in Oklahoma
The northern are on a display for many Oklahomans on Thursday night, a rare visual treat seldom seen this far south in the U.S.
The northern are on a display for many Oklahomans on Thursday night, a rare visual treat seldom seen this far south in the U.S.
The northern are on a display for many Oklahomans on Thursday night, a rare visual treat seldom seen this far south in the U.S.
The northern are on a display for many Oklahomans Thursday night, a rare visual treat seldom seen this far south in the U.S.
KOCO 5 Meteorologist Damon Lane said Oklahoma is between the northern lights viewing opportunity right now and the chance has increased for later tonight.
>> Open the video player above to see some pictures of the Northern Lights in Oklahoma from May
In May, a solar storm brought the dazzling lights of the aurora borealis to many in Oklahoma, where the phenomenon was visible from Yukon to Mountain View.
Another coronal mass ejection from the sun produced a chance for Oklahomans to see the northern lights again on Thursday.
The best time to spot the northern lights is between Thursday night to 4 a.m. Friday, where they will come in waves.
On Wednesday, the Space Weather Prediction Center issued a G4 Geomagnetic Storm Watch, marking the second time thatâ€™s happened in 20 years.
If you capture great pictures of the Northern Lights in Oklahoma, be sure to upload them here.

author: Nicole Wells
title: Rep. Troy Nehls to Newsmax: Some GOP Lawmakers Don't Want to Win | Newsmax.com
text: By Nicole Wells | Thursday, 27 June 2024 07:42 PM EDT Rep. Troy Nehls, R-Texas, told Newsmax on Thursday that if Rep. Anna Paulina Luna's vote to jail Attorney General Merrick Garland fails, it will be "shameful" and because some members of the GOP conference don't want to "ride to the winner's circle." The House voted to hold Garland in contempt of Congress two weeks ago for refusing to turn over the audio of President Joe Biden's interview with Department of Justice special counsel Robert Hur in his classified documents case. At a press conference Wednesday morning, Luna, R-Fla., said Garland still had 48 hours to turn over the audio of Biden's interview before she files a motion to force a vote on imprisoning him. Earlier in the week, Rep. Kat Cammack, R-Fla., predicted to Newsmax that the first thing that will happen once Luna files her motion is that a motion will be made to table it, or effectively kill it. During an appearance on Newsmax's "The Chris Salcedo Show," Nehls said, "If Cammack is correct, I think it's very shameful. "I think Merrick Garland is un-American. Everything that guy does, he provides cover for this corrupt administration," he said. "And shame on the Republican conference if we would decide to get a member or two to table that. I tell you, nothing surprises me up here, though. "Look at some of the legislation. Look how long it took us to finally impeach [Department of Homeland Security Secretary Alejandro] Mayorkas," he continued. "And we as a Republican conference, Republicans everywhere have been complaining about this southern border crisis for three years. It took us until this year to impeach Mayorkas." If Luna's vote fails, Nehls said, the blame will lie with individual members of the Republican caucus that are not on the same page as the majority. "So we've got some individuals in the conference that just don't want to seem to jump on the same bus and ride to the winner's circle, jump on the same horse and go to the winner's circle together," he said. "They don't want to do it." About NEWSMAX TV: NEWSMAX is the fastest-growing cable news channel in America! Nicole Wells, a Newsmax general assignment reporter covers news, politics, and culture. She is a National Newspaper Association award-winning journalist. Â© 2024 Newsmax. All rights reserved. Receive breaking news and original analysis - sent right to your inbox. author: Fred Pennic
title: ARCHIMED Acquires a Majority Stake in Arkstone - Health M&A
text:
What You Should Know:
â€“ Arkstone , a pioneer in machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) -driven infectious disease clinical decision support and antimicrobial stewardship has been acquired by ARCHIMED , a private equity firm specializing in the healthcare sector. Financial details of the acquisition were not disclosed.
â€“ The acquisition marks a pivotal moment in Arkstoneâ€™s growth trajectory, positioning the company to expand its global footprint, deepen its R&D capabilities, and bring its precision-guided technology to more clinicians worldwide.
â€“ Backed by ARCHIMEDâ€™s capital, extensive healthcare expertise, and international reach, Arkstone is poised to scale its impact on the global fight against antimicrobial resistance (AMR), one of the most urgent public health threats of our time.
Redefining Infectious Disease Management with AI The global fight against antimicrobial resistance is a critical public health challenge. Arkstoneâ€™s flagship OneChoice Report leverages human-in-the-loop ML and AI to generate optimal infectious disease treatment recommendations. It achieves this by analyzing laboratory results alongside patient data, delivering patient-specific guidance to clinicians at the moment lab results are received. Already in use by laboratories across the United States and internationally, Arkstone is transforming how healthcare providers diagnose, treat, and understand infectious diseases.
Following the acquisition, Arkstone will continue to operate with its existing team. The companyâ€™s next phase will focus on rapid growth, further product development, and entry into new markets.
â€œArkstoneâ€™s OneChoice Report is redefining infectious disease management. Our partnership will enable Arkstone to reach more markets, accelerate product innovation, and ultimately save lives by reducing the misuse of antibiotics,â€ said Igor Petricca, Partner at ARCHIMED. â€œThis deal offers an additional dimension, as Clinical Decision Support software (CDS) and infectious disease are at the crossroads of hot subsectors of our Healthcare IT and Diagnostics franchises.â€

author: @WSAZnews
title: Kanawha Co. teacher charged with harming disabled child
text:
Handcuffs generic (MGN | MGN Image (Credit)) By WSAZ News Staff Published: Apr. 2, 2025 at 5:05 PM EDT | Updated: 3 hours ago Email This Link
Share on Facebook
Share on X (formerly Twitter)
Share on Pinterest
Share on LinkedIn
KANAWHA COUNTY, W.Va. (WSAZ) â€“ An elementary school teacher accused of harming a disabled child is facing charges.
According to court information, Patricia Lynn Summerfield, 56, of Charleston has been charged with the assault or unlawful physical harm of a disabled child in her care.
Summerfield is a teacher at Holz Elementary School, according to the Kanawha County School District.
Kanawha County Schools released the following statement on Wednesday regarding the arrest:
â€œA report was made to Holz administrators on Tuesday about a possible incident with a staff member. School administrators took all appropriate action per KCS policies. At this time, the district is unable to comment any further because state law prohibits discussing issues related to personnel.â€
Summerfield bond was set at $75,000.
A preliminary hearing has been set for April 10.
Keep checking the WSAZ app for the latest information.
